definition: breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: Tore his old wings off with a sigh.
sentences.chinese: 叹息着他撕下自己古老的鲜血淋淋的翅膀。

sentences.english: The wind sighed in the branches.
sentences.chinese: 风在树枝间发出叹息的声音。

sentences.english: Weep no more , no sigh , nor groan . Sorrow calls no time that's gone .
sentences.chinese: 栵别哭泣，别叹息，别呻吟，悲伤唤不回流逝的时光。

sentences.english: He turned to the audience with an embarrassed sigh.
sentences.chinese: 他转向听众并发出了窘迫的叹息声。

sentences.english: So bound home from Providence alone, I was groaning to myself on the train.
sentences.chinese: 我独自从普罗维登斯返回，不禁在火车上喟然叹息。

sentences.english: Most make you giggle and groan in equal measure.
sentences.chinese: 书中大部分笑话令人笑过之后掩卷叹息。

sentences.english: Copper sky, shadows rise, bridge of sighs.
sentences.chinese: 红铜色的天空，阴影出现，叹息桥。

sentences.english: If you don't like the Penguins, you might be shaking your head in dismay .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不喜欢企鹅队，你有可能会摇头叹息。

sentences.english: The new wine mourneth, the vine languisheth, all the merryhearted do sigh.
sentences.chinese: 新酒悲哀，葡萄树衰残，心中欢乐的，变为叹息。

sentences.english: "Well, " she sigh a way, "so far, I must not swim past. "
sentences.chinese: “唉，”她叹息道，“这么远，我肯定游不过去的。”

sentences.english: The soldiers are still lamenting for their families.
sentences.chinese: 战士还在为思念亲人而叹息。

sentences.english: There were groans all around the room.
sentences.chinese: 房间里弥漫着此起彼伏的叹息声。

sentences.english: Talking with them are tedious so I can't help shaking head and sighing.
sentences.chinese: 跟这些人谈话真是索然无味，因此才摇头叹息。

sentences.english: My sigh in the background as you pick out the cashews hates you.
sentences.chinese: 你采摘腰果的时候，我在后面的叹息声恨你。

sentences.english: Groanings which cannot be uttered are often prayers which cannot be refused.
sentences.chinese: 说不出来的叹息，常是不能拒绝的祷告。

sentences.english: The announcement was greeted with a muted sigh of disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 这个宣告却迎来人们充满失望的暗自叹息。

definition: to force a smile/a bitter laugh
to sigh with sorrow, regret etc/rueful/deeply moved
to regret/to feel that it is a great pity/to feel sorry for sb
to talk to oneself/to think aloud/to soliloquize
tone of voice/the way one speaks/manner of expression/tone
